AboutDescription:
I am a professional Front-End Developer with over two years of experience designing and developing modern, interactive user interfaces using the latest web technologies. I possess strong skills in:

HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for building responsive structures and layouts.

Bootstrap and Tailwind CSS to create elegant, fast-responsive interfaces that support various devices and screens.

React.js for developing dynamic and scalable web applications, with experience managing state using Context API and Redux.

I am also proficient with version control tools like Git and GitHub to work within teams and organize code professionally.

I have extensive experience integrating APIs to connect front-end interfaces with back-end systems, enabling smooth and seamless applications. I always consider performance optimization, fast loading, and user experience to ensure cross-browser compatibility.

I focus on applying best UX/UI design standards and continuously learn modern technologies to deliver innovative, high-quality projects that meet and exceed client expectations.
ManyProjects: Many completed projects across various fields (commercial, educational, personal)
ReactApps: Building responsive and fast React applications
